street_name: between the Waterworks and City Mill Rivers and railway lines further south (Marshgate).
description: Submission of details to discharge Condition 3 (Material Samples) of planning permission 18/00424/REM dated 29th March 2019 in so far as it relates to the bush-hammered and acid etched finishes to pre-cast concrete panels on the external face of the building on the upper levels (above the fluid zone).
site_name: South of the ArcelorMittal Orbit and South Plaza
decision_conditions:
Works in accordance with approved details

The development shall be carried out and retained thereafter in accordance with the following drawings and documents:
		
•	Floorplan and elevation drawings annotated to show distribution of texture and gradient of concrete finishes:
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-0000-0100-00300 P00 - North elevation
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-0000-0100-00301 P00 - South elevation
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-0000-0100-00302 P00 - East elevation
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-0000-0100-00303 P00 - West elevation
•	Mace and London Concrete Material Specification
•	Photographs of concrete samples illustrating colour and texture gradient from base to top of the precast panels.
•	Mace Quality Plan Record Sheet Neighbourhood #1 - 30mm bush hammered finish and Acid Etched return colour C398 (DRS 1041)
•	Mace Quality Plan Record Sheet Neighbourhood #2 - 20mm bush hammered finish and Acid Etched return colour C402 (DRS 1058)
•	Mace Quality Plan Record Sheet Neighbourhood #3 - 10mm bush hammered finish and Acid Etched return colour C401 (DRS 1057)


Reason: To ensure that the development is undertaken in accordance with the approved drawings.
